content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, let us focus on discussing the rental price for this prime location in Magdeburg's city center. I believe my property warrants a competitive price and aim to maximize my returns. Shall we begin negotiations?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your perspective regarding the apartment in Magdeburg's city center. While I understand the desirability of the location, I am seeking the most cost-effective option to match my budget. Could you provide an initial rental price suggestion for consideration? I'm open to negotiations to reach an agreeable compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Initially contemplating a rental price of 1250 Euros per month, considering your budgetary constraints, I am willing to lower my expectations to 1200 Euros while maintaining my commitment to receive a fair return for my investment in this exceptional property. Let us begin the negotiation process from this point.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your flexibility in adjusting the rental price, lowering it to 1200 Euros per month. However, I must still explore potential reductions to meet my financial limitations even more closely. Would you consider reducing the rental price further, perhaps around 1150 Euros? I believe this compromise would better suit my needs while respecting your investment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
While I understand your pursuit of a reasonable rental fee, I must emphasize that dropping the price below 1200 Euros poses a challenge to fulfilling my financial objectives. This property's location and condition warrant a premium price point. Nevertheless, given our open communication, I am willing to consider an exception and accept 1180 Euros per month as a final rental price offer. Let us conclude the negotiation and finalize the terms.
